gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax

Class OptionFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.CmdLineSyntax.OptionFlag

  • public class OptionFlag
extends java.lang.Object
    This class OptionFlag represents an object of an option flag. An option flag is an item in a liked list. It includes name, parent, and child. An option flag may has none, one, or multiple argument(s). It's arguments are its children in the linked list format.

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
